name: Wells
description: Play as Wells, a steampunk hero ready to find an amazing variety of weapons, each unique in design and functionality, and get ready to face a plethora of enemies and challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Quad Core Intel or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
